Everyone at the front desk is foreign (which is fine) but it seems like they just landed since they know nothing about the city or what services the hotel can provide. Every question I asked required them to go to the back office where an english speaking person would come out with attitude like I was inconveniencing them. There are plenty of other options in downtown that would be better than this.

Reviews.Title: “It was okay...”
Reviews.Author: Shelleeee
Reviews.Content: The Sheraton Indianapolis is in a great location however the property has some issues that need to be addressed before I stay there again. The first problem is the parking garage. It’s under construction and very difficult to navigate through. I suggest taking the additional insurance at your rental car company if you plan on parking at this hotel. I stayed at this hotel when it was a Radisson and I must say they have upgraded some features during the transition but are not done yet. While the changes such as bed linens and toiletries have been made, the rooms are still in need of remodeling. My room had an old air vent which made it difficult for me to sleep well, the carpet was also dingy and in need of replacement, the bathroom also needed retiling and my room had a dank smell like it use to be a smoking room or something. Oh yea… only a few of their elevators were working and the morning wait to get to the lobby was upwards of 5 minutes. On a better note the staff was very friendly and made up for the hotels physical appearance. Aside from the $2 charge for a small tube of toothpaste I was very pleased with the level of service I received. While self parking I ended up in a valet space because they were full. I let the bellmen know and they were very helpful, one of them moved my vehicle for me and the other one helped me with restaurant recommendations while I waited to get my keys back. They also have a Starbucks located in the lobby which is always a plus for me. This property isn’t all bad, I’m sure once they finish their remodel it will be a great place to stay but until then be prepared for a few inconveniences.

Reviews.Title: “Great service”
Reviews.Author: travelincritic
Reviews.Content: This is a nice Sheraton (I´ve stayed in some pretty bad ones). It is in a great location for eating out, walking around etc. A good conference facility and pretty nice work out space. The staff absolutely bent over backwards to offer dining out suggestions, help with directions, etc. Probably the most sincerely nice and helpful staff I´ve ever seen. Rooms were nice and clean.

Reviews.Title: “good location, thats about it”
Reviews.Author: satriani
Reviews.Content: Let me first start by saying the retail price of $149 was ridiculous. We paid $69 on priceline and might have been too much other than the good location. Its only a few blocks walk to the mall and plenty of restaurants. Upon check-in I was told by the clerk that "the computer wont let me change your room from a king to a double" even though I didnt book a king bed. I was with my 15 year old son who probably didnt want to stay in the same bed as me any more than I did. Anyway, I told them to see if they could change it later because we were going to a game that afternoon. Needless to say, they didnt and we shared the same bed. The shower curtain had lots of mold on it and my son even mentioned that to me. The water didnt drain very will in the tub and I stood in a few inches of water when I showered. The hotel is ok, but I wouldnt pay full price for this place. The room was clean and we really didnt spend any time in the hotel other than to sleep. For $69 it was ok, but I'd look at other hotels next time.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience”
Reviews.Author: Daytontravelmom
Reviews.Content: I could not have been more pleased with my stay at this Sheraton in downtown Indianapolis. Staff was incredibly accommodating and friendly. Hotel was recently remodeled with beautiful furnishings/decor. Bed was extremely comfortable. Would definitely recommend and stay again. Cannot think of a single negative!
